sentences.sContent: This is a heated debate which involves materialist as opposed to idealist views.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is a heated debate which involves materialist as opposed to idealist views.
sentences.sCn: 这是一场唯物主义与唯心主义的大论战。

sentences.sContent: Frost is a kind of materialist, by which I mean he calls attention to the circumstances of imagination, its limits and conditions.
sentences.sContent_eng: Frost is a kind of materialist, by which I mean he calls attention to the circumstances of imagination, its limits and conditions.
sentences.sCn: 弗罗斯特是个唯物主义者，这样说的原因是他引起了人们对,想象的环境的注意，它的限制和条件。

words.tran: 重要的；物质的，实质性的；肉体的
唯物主义；唯物论；物质主义
使具体化，使有形；使突然出现；使重物质而轻精神

trans.tranCn: 唯物主义者；实利主义者
